entry.title: Surrey 1500 Dining Table
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Dining
Price: 899.00

The Surrey 1500 Dining Table will make a beautiful complement to your dining room, featuring a relaxed Hamptons design with two-tone timber. 

Also available: Surrey Dining Chair.

entry.title: Lyon Dining Table - 2.4m
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Dining
Price: 2699.00

A solid oak frame and dark wood make the Lyon a stunning centrepiece for your dining space. A classic pedestal base gives it a regal look that pairs perfectly with timeless decor.

Also available in 2.2m size exclusively at Joondalup store.

*The Lyon dining table will feature variations and wood “checking“, imperfections, splits & cracks. This is a natural phenomenon in timber, which may occur as the wood dries and loses moisture. While they do alter the appearance of the timber, this is perfectly normal and does not affect the solid wood's structural integrity. Wood Checks do not warrant any form of replacement, they add value and uniqueness to this luxury piece.

entry.title: Nexion 2000 Dining Table
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Dining
Price: 1299.00

The modern, sleek design of the Nexion Dining table will inject glamorous, luxe appeal into your dining room. A contrasting marble table top with metal legs gives this table flair and sophistication.

*Due to the heavy and delicate nature of marble, we highly recommend our marble dining tables be delivered by our White Glove Delivery service. This ensures a quality, reliable, and secure delivery, guaranteeing your beautiful marble table arrives in perfect condition.

entry.title: Surrey Counter Table
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Dining
Price: 799.00

The Surrey Counter Table brings a relaxed feel to your informal dining, featuring a relaxed Hamptons design with two-tone timber. 

Also available:  Surrey Bar Stool & Surrey High Bench.

entry.title: Riviera 2400 Dining Table
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Dining
Price: 3999.00

Meticulously crafted from solid reclaimed elm wood and anchored on a solid pine base, this dining table has a unique origin. Our supplier in Asia buys ornate doors from local villagers that carry the marks of a long, useful life. These aged elm doors are then skilfully repurposed and transformed using traditional carpentry methods to create something new and beautiful. This charming table has already stood the test of time, displaying textures and depth that only come from age, and ensuring each piece is one of a kind and unlike any other. 

Also available:  Riviera Dining Chair & Riviera Bench Seat.

entry.title: Bremer Bay Dining Table
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Dining
Price: 699.00 - 999.00 (2 variants)

Fashioned from solid, reclaimed pine, the Bremer Bay Dining Table features a timber top with a tawny stain to achieve a weathered look, and ivory trestle style legs for contrast. Perfectly paired with the Bremer Bay Dining Chair and Bremer Bay Dining Bench.

entry.title: Bremer Bay 1500 Round Dining Table
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Dining
Price: 1299.00

Introducing the Bremer Bay 1500 Round Dining Table, where coastal charm meets rustic elegance. Breathing beauty into your home like the stunning seaside town from which it is named, this dining table has been crafted using reclaimed solid pine timber with a contrasting ivory base.  Pairs beautifully with the Bremer Bay Dining Chair.

entry.title: Krakatoa Dining Table
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Dining
Price: 1990.00 - 2690.00 (3 variants)

Rest assured the bespoke Krakatoa will be yours and only yours. Each one is uniquely different due to its stunning natural edge, completing a piece that commands attention. Crafted from solid teak wood atop iron legs for durability and strength.

entry.title: Esperance Dining Table

The Esperance Dining Table is something special. This is a stunning bespoke table crafted from SOLID Salmon Gum with an incredible natural edge, designed to capture attention and add raw, organic beauty to your dining room. Each one is unique and made to order.

Available for special order in store only.

Also available:  Esperance Metal Dining Chair.

entry.title: Corsica Dining Table
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery

Price: 1999.00

A French-inspired masterpiece for the dining space, the Corsica Dining Table crafted from solid oak features a grand pedestal base and rustic finish.  Exuding warmth, sophistication and a sense of luxury.

*The Corsica dining table will feature variations and wood “checking“, imperfections, splits & cracks.  This is a natural phenomenon in timber, which may occur as the wood dries and loses moisture.  Wood Checks do not warrant any form of replacement, they add value and uniqueness to this luxury piece.

entry.title: Verdelho Extension Dining Table
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Dining
Price: 2699.00

American oak combines with European Beech Timber to create the stunning Verdelho Extension Dining Table, a testament to superior craftsmanship and quality in every detail. Featuring a contrasting white feature pedestal base and a gorgeous parquetry pattern table top, this table will imbue your home with classic elegance.

Also available:  Verdelho Dining Chair.

This product is made exclusively with Blum hardware.
